channel.title: Learningpages on buaaladeng

item.title: Awk
item.description: 安装rabbitmq 安装erlang jumbo install erlang 附：安装jumbo：bash -c “$( curl http://jumbo.baidu.com/install_jumbo.sh )“; source ~/.bashrc 安装rabbitmq wget http://www.rabbitmq.com/releases/rabbitmq-server/v3.1.5/rabbitmq-server-generic-unix-3.1.5.tar.gz tar -xzvf rabbitmq-server-generic-unix-3.1.5.tar.gz 启动:：./sbin/rabbitmq-server -detached 关闭：./sbin/rabbitmqctl stop 若单机有多个实例，则在rabbitmqctlh后加–n 指定名称 安装插件：./sbin/rabbitmq-plugins enable mochiweb rabbitmq_management 查看已经安装的插件：./sbin/rabbitmq-plugins list 常用命令 用户管理 新建用户：./sbin/rabbitmqctl add_user admin admin123 删除用户: ./sbin/rabbitmqctl delete_user xxx 改密码: ./sbin/rabbitmqctl change_password {username} {newpassword} 设置用户角色：./sbin/rabbitmqctl set_user_tags {username} {tag ...} Tag可以为 administrator,monitoring, management 查看用户：./sbin/rabbitmqctl list_users 添加虚拟机：./sbin/rabbitmqctl add_vhost adminvhost 查看虚拟机：./sbin/rabbitmqctl list_vhosts 分配权限：./sbin/rabbitmqctl set_permissions -p adminvhost admin “.” “.” “.
